title: Kristian kal fimkhur rawh hlauhawm a hnai
lyrics:
Kristian kal fimkhur rawh, hlauhawm a hnai,
Hemi khawvela i awm chhung zawngin;
Setana thlemnain i vel a dap,
Setana hneh nan i Lalpa dil rawh.
Kristian kal fimkhur rawh, hlauhawm a hnai.

Kristian hlimin kal rawh, hlauhawmah pawh
Khua nasa takin lo dur mah sela;
Khaw dur nasa leh chhum a lo kiang ang,
Chhandamtu hnenah i awm kumkhua ang.
Kristian hlimin kal rawh, hlauhawmah pawh.

Kristian, tawngtai fo rawh, thlemtu a hnai,
Lalpan a koh che chu theihnghilh suh la;
I chhandamtuu hnenah i tawngtai chuan,
Thlemna tinah him takin i kal ang.
Kristian, tawngtai fo rawh, thlemtu a hnai.

Kristian, beisei fo rawh, lungngaih pawhin,
Van chawlhna hlua i chawlhna tur;
Lalpa rorel huna i lawmna tur,
I Lalpa lawmna takkah chuan lut rawh.
Kristian, beisei fo rawh, lungngaih pawhin.
